name: Chronos (itch) (makersmelx, whitefox_september, jfaro)
description:
Introduction

Chronos is a fast-paced parkour plat-former.  Race through the rooftops of a futuristic city to reach the goal. Time is limited, so move with speed and agility.

Control

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Shield: Right Mouse Button 

Credits

Julien Faro (Art Direction, Audio Design/Production, Programmer)

Yuyue Tu (Data Analyst, Playtester)

Jiayao Wu (Game Designer, Project Manager, Lead Programmer)

Bohan Xu (Lead Game Designer, Programmer)
